game

Class SnippingAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.SnippingAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    public class SnippingAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    A class which represents sniping action which perform attack to specific target using specific miss chance and damage.
    Author:
    Tan Wei Li, Kee Pei Jiin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int aimNumber
      an integer representing the number of consecutive aiming before SnippingAction
      private int[] damage
      an array of integer represent different damage of SnippingAction after different number of consecutive aiming corresponding to the value of index
      private int[] MISS_CHANCE
      a constant array of integer represent different miss chance of SnippingAction after different number of consecutive aiming corresponding to the value of index
      private LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle
      a LongRangedWeapon used in SnippingAction
      private edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target
      An Actor which acts as target of SnippingAction

      Initialize value for damage of SnippingAction based on target and sniperRifle for each index which correspond to different number of consecutive aiming before the SnippingAction.

      Perform attack to the target with different damage and miss chance based on the number of consecutive aiming before the SnippingAction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SnippingAction

        public SnippingAction(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target,
                      LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructor. Specify the target and weapon used in SnippingAction. aimNumber set as 0 initially. Initialize value for damage array based on the target and sniperRifle.
        Parameters:
        target - An actor which acts as target of SnippingAction
        sniperRifle - a LongRangedWeapon used in SnippingAction
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or sniperRifle argument is null

      • SnippingAction

        public SnippingAction(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target,
                      LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle,
                      int aimNumber)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor. Specify the target, weapon and aimNumber used in SnippingAction. Initialize value for damage array based on the target and sniperRifle.
        Parameters:
        target - An actor which acts as target of SnippingAction
        sniperRifle - a LongRangedWeapon used in SnippingAction
        aimNumber - The number of turns that are spent for aiming
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or sniperRifle argument is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aimNumber is not 1 or 2

    • Method Detail

      • createDamagesLevel

        private void createDamagesLevel(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor target,
                                LongRangedWeapon sniperRifle)
        Initialize value for damage of SnippingAction based on target and sniperRifle for each index which correspond to different number of consecutive aiming before the SnippingAction.
        Parameters:
        target - An actor which acts as target of SnippingAction
        sniperRifle - The LongRangedWeapon used in the SnippingAction

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Perform attack to the target with different damage and miss chance based on the number of consecutive aiming before the SnippingAction. Each execution of SnippingAction uses up one bullet in the SniperRifle and the actor loses concentration at the target after shooting.
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - The map the actor is on.
        Returns:
        A suitable description to display in the UI
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or map argument is null
        See Also:
        Action.execute(Actor, GameMap)

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Return description string which describe the level of damage of the SnippingAction.
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        a string which describe the aiming action (eg: "Player snipe at Groan for double damage", "Player instant kill Groan")
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor is null
        See Also:
        Action.menuDescription(Actor)
